job_tasks.phrase: Streamline, automate and manage our infrastructure and application deployment processes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of managing and automating infrastructure and deployment, which are key components of Operations Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of our AI applications.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on scalability, security, and performance of applications, especially AI applications, falls under the operational management and maintenance aspect of MLOps.
Maintaining and enhancing CI/CD pipelines is a fundamental responsibility within Operations Engineering for automating software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitor infrastructure, ensure high availability, and proactively address any issues.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring infrastructure, ensuring high availability, and addressing issues are core operational tasks related to system maintenance and reliability.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with our developers to integrate code into the shared repository.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes collaboration on code integration, a common aspect of software development workflows.

soft_skills.phrase: eager to be a foundational member of a growing team

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes DevOps and operations engineering tasks, focusing on infrastructure, deployment, and CI/CD pipelines. While AI applications are mentioned, there is no direct evidence of core GenAI engineering responsibilities like prompt engineering, RAG, or model fine-tuning.
